title: How to start selling toys with Amazon, Flipkart, etc. - Quora

response.answer_text: In order to start selling toys with online portals like Amazon, Flipkart, the very first step you need to take is having GST number and then register as a seller on these portals in toys category. Click Here to register for an Amazon seller account : Amazon Click Here to register for a Flipkart seller account : Sell Online on Flipkart
